info.title: Nexmo SMS API
info.description: Nexmo makes it simple to send and receive a high volume of SMS anywhere in the world within minutes.

get.description: Nexmo makes it simple to send and receive a high volume of SMS anywhere in the world within minutes.

parameters.name: client-ref
parameters.description: Include any reference string for your reference. Useful for your internal reports (40 characters max).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sender address may be alphanumeric (Ex: from=MyCompany20). Restrictions may apply, depending on the destination.

parameters.name: network-code
parameters.description: Force the recipient network operator MCCMNC, make sure to supply the correct information otherwise the message wont be delivered.

parameters.name: status-report-req
parameters.description: Set to 1 if you want to receive a delivery report (DLR) for this request. Make sure to configure your Callback URL in your API Settings

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Body of the text message (with a maximum length of 3200 characters), UTF-8 and URL encoded value.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Mobile number in international format, and one recipient per request.

parameters.name: type_of_media
parameters.description: This can be omitted for text (default), but is required when sending a Binary (binary), WAP Push (wappush), Unicode message (unicode), vcal (vcal) or vcard (vcard).
